starvationevasion.client.Aegislash.GUI

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • starvationevasion.client.Aegislash.GUI.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
    starvationevasion.client.Aegislash.GUI.java is the class which holds the thread for running the main gui of starvation evasion The starvationevasion.client.Aegislash.GUI is responsible for drawing the game state on the screen for the user and for receiving user input The starvationevasion.client.Aegislash.GUI displays to the user the the time remaining in the phase, the visualization, data graphs information related to food products, the user's hand, the cards the user has drafted, the user's deck and discard pile, and other information relating to the draft. This is how the user interacts with the game
